abstracts.cdata!:
The development objective of the
            Deepening Medium Term Budget Framework (MTBF) and
            Strengthening Financial Accountability Project for
            Bangladesh is to deepen and institutionalize the MTBF and
            build a more strategic and performance oriented budget
            management process, while strengthening financial
            accountability across the expenditure management cycle. This
            restructuring paper discusses two changes to the project: 1)
            a revision of the results framework for the project to
            adequately capture the achievement of project development
            objectives, intermediate results; and 2) an amendment of the
            grant agreement to enable the project to extend the terms of
            the position as communications specialist from 24 months to
            45 months and to remove from the grant agreement specific
            terms of contracts for specialist positions under the
            Project Management Coordination Unit (PMCU). During the 2012
            restructuring, a revision of the result framework was
            initiated to simplify the original framework, which
            contained more than sixty indicators, and reflect the change
            in component structure. The results framework is to be
            revised for the project to adequately capture the
            achievement of project development objectives, intermediate results.
